cmp: 那 (how/which, that/those, that/those/(sometimes used before a measure word, especially in Beijing))

exm.mng: to shift (funds), to (legitimately) take funds set aside for one purpose in order to use them for another, to embezzle, to misappropriate
to borrow money for a short time
see 閃轉騰挪|闪转腾挪[shan3 zhuan3 teng2 nuo2]
to move nimbly about, dodging and weaving (martial arts)
to move, to shift, to move out of the way, to divert (money etc) to a different purpose
